txt.en: 'I heard there are wolves near Budgeford.'
'I heard there's a party being planned down in Hobbiton. Bigger than Mad Baggins' party, even!'
'I heard one of the Big Folk is camped on the Greenfields. He sounds like an unsavoury fellow to me.'
'I heard there's trouble in the quarry at Scary. Doesn't surprise me, with all that digging going on.'
